lead_paragraph: South African Jaco Van Zyl, who sat out the year's last major, the PGA Championship, to prepare for the Olympics, says the world's top-ranked golfers are using the Zika virus as an excuse to dodge the Rio Games.

headline.print_headline: Zika an Excuse for Top Ranked Players, Says Golfer Van Zyl
headline.main: Zika an Excuse for Top Ranked Players, Says Golfer Van Zyl
